Forms

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Radios

Radio buttons let users switch between a predefined set of options.

Compatibility

Be sure that the input's type is radio, that each of the input's ids match their label's for, and that each of the inputs have the same name!

Note that for the label to be displayed correctly, it must come directly after the input tag.

<form class="form-control" action="#" method="post">
    <div class="radio">
        <input type="radio" id="example-radio-1" name="example-radio-1" class="radio-input" checked>
        <label for="example-radio-1" class="radio-label">
            Radio Option 1
        </label>
    </div>

    <div class="radio">
        <input type="radio" id="example-radio-2" name="example-radio-1" class="radio-input">
        <label for="example-radio-2" class="radio-label">
            Radio Option 2
        </label>
    </div>
    
    <div class="radio">
        <input type="radio" id="example-radio-3" name="example-radio-1" class="radio-input">
        <label for="example-radio-3" class="radio-label">
            Radio Option 3
        </label>
    </div>
</form>

Sizes

Radio buttons can be resized.
<button class="small"> Small </button>
<button> Default </button>
<button class="medium"> Medium </button>
<button class="large"> Large </button>
